pr_title: Fix available tab sort order and support popularity outside 0..1 range

timeline.message: Fix Available tab sort order and support popularity outside 0..1 range
Fix Available tab sort order and support popularity outside 0..1 range

timeline.bodyText: Supports numbers up to <10 billion: 1234567890.1234 so every human can install the plugin on their personal instance and this will still be fine 😄
timeline.author: daniel-beck
